description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Travels of Richard and John Lander ... for the discovery of the course ... of the Niger, from unpublished documents in the possession of the late J. W. Barber Fullerton, with a prefatory analysis of the previous travels of Park, Denham, Clapperton, Adams, Lyon, Ritchie, etc. into the hitherto unexplored countries of Africa" Author: HUISH, Robert. Contributor: ADAMS, Robert - Sailor Contributor: CLAPPERTON, Hugh. Contributor: DENHAM, Dixon. Contributor: LANDER, John - Traveller Contributor: LANDER, Richard - Traveller Contributor: LYON, George Francis. Contributor: RITCHIE, Joseph - Traveller Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1047.h.11." Page: 382 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1836 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001762302 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
